product_name: The North Face Bansko Insulated Pants - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Chase down fresh powder and protect your lower half with the lightly insulated, waterproof Bansko Insulated Pants for women from The North Face. Waterproof, windproof and breathable HyVent(R) exterior offers 4-way stretch and is fully seam-sealed. Lightly insulated with 60g Heatseeker(TM) insulation for a boost of warmth beyond your baselayers. Venting system allows hot air to rise through the stretch mesh gaiters and escape through the upper thigh vents. Bansko Insulated Pants for women from The North Face feature a streamlined fit with a relaxed, adjustable waist and slimmer cut through the thighs and knees. Zippered handwarmer pockets; polyurethane cargo pocket; kick patches; reinforced edge guards. Closeout.
short_description: Chase down fresh powder and protect your lower half with the lightly insulated, waterproof Bansko Insulated Pants for women from The North Face.
